name: Emilio Butragueño 2
description:
"Emilio Butragueño 2" is the sequel to the award-winning Emilio Butragueño Fútbol. This game consists of two parts, which are in fact two games previously released in England under a license from English player Gary Lineker- Gary Lineker's Super Skills and Gary Lineker's Hot-Shot.

On the first one, we will practice the basic skills which could be helpful for our aspirations, so in order to improve them we will have to chose difficulty level and then train flexions, displacements (with cones, flags...), ball juggling, dribbling, penalty shots, etc.

And finally, on the second part (load), we will try to win the World Cup, for that, we will choose game length, control method and our team, then, we will be playing in one of the four (rather Euro-centric in composition) groups composed by Brazil, Argentina, England, Scotland, Wales, Ulster, Ireland, France, Germany, Holland, Denmark, Spain, Italy, Poland, USSR and Uruguay.
developedBy: Gremlin Graphics Software Limited, Wise Owl Software

shot.caption: This screen displays while part 1 - the Gymnasium part of the game is loading
The player can choose to load or to configure the game

Number of players taking part.
Joysticks are displayed even if the keyboard has been chosen as the controller
As exercises are performed, health / vitality decreases and pulse rate increases. These can be restored by taking a drink or a rest
Here he's too tired to reach the bars
After a drink vitality is restored. Note the water bottle has decreased. Completing the traverse of the bars quickly earns a bonus
The next exercise is the weight lift. That really tires him out. Heart rate is very high and all the water is gone.
This screen is displayed as part 2, the Football Competition, loads
This is were game options are chosen. The left & right  keys change the option being looked at, displayed below the ball. Up & down keys change the current value - shown above the ball
Here the team strips have been changed to Holland vs Uraguay and the controller has been changed to keyboard
League tables are accessed from the same menu, scroll until the words 'SPC PARA VER' are on the bottom line, use the up / down keys to select the division, then 'FIRE'
The game starts. Team scores are on the left -shown against team strip. Player distribution is in the mini field window.
